meanings: Noun 그랜트 Ulysses Simpson ~ (1822-85) ((미국 남북 전쟁 때의 북군 총사령관, 제18대 대통령(1869-77)))

vlive.korean: 일곱 개의 조각이 맞춰지면 소원을 들어주는 건가? If I find all 7 pieces, it'll grant my wish? 듣기 View video 컨스TV : 웹드라마 [기적 소녀 5화] 공기놀이로 우리를 이겨봐
vlive.english: If I find all 7 pieces, it'll grant my wish?

vlive.korean: 소원 좀 들어주세요 - 잘 어울릴 것 같다 - 수염이요? Grant me a wish. - I think you would look really good. - A mustache? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] NU'EST X LieV - 뉴이스트의 눕방라이브!
vlive.english: Grant me a wish. - I think you would look really good. - A mustache?

vlive.korean: 진짜 소원이 그거야? You really want me to grant that wish? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 데이트하면 이제 행복할 줄 알았는데.. [일진에게 찍혔을 때] EP11
vlive.english: You really want me to grant that wish?

vlive.korean: [소원성취, 드디어 등장한 리사의 최애 음식] 이거! [LISA's wish granted, LISA's favorite food] This! 듣기 View video BLACKPINK : BLACKPINK - 'BLACKPINK DIARIES' EP.7
vlive.english: [LISA's wish granted, LISA's favorite food] This!

vlive.korean: [그럼 안 마시게] 혹시 이거 당연한 거예요? 이거? [I want to refuse it] Is it something you think I take for granted? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.10 당.당.감.체 #1
vlive.english: [I want to refuse it] Is it something you think I take for granted?

examples.korean: She starred opposite Cary Grant in ‘Bringing up Baby’. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 ‘베이비[사자 새끼] 길들이기’에서 캐리 그란트의 상대로 주연을 맡았었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She starred opposite Cary Grant in ‘Bringing up Baby’. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The following articles constitute a kit taken by Captains Speke and Grant in their journey, 1860-63, from Zanzibar to Egypt. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 다음 제품은 1860년에서 63년에 걸쳐 스페케와 그란트 양대위가 진지바르에서 '이집트'까지의 여행에 휴대한 용구일식이다. 영어영작문대사전
examples.english: The following articles constitute a kit taken by Captains Speke and Grant in their journey, 1860-63, from Zanzibar to Egypt. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They felt like Cary Grant and Audrey Hepburn. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 캐리 그란트와 오드리 햅번이 된 것 같았다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 비비안나(vivi****)
examples.english: They felt like Cary Grant and Audrey Hepburn. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: In the summer Grant arrived at Stamford Bridge. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 여름에 아브람 그란트는 스탬퍼드 브릿지에 도착했다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 메르베이(psys****)
examples.english: In the summer Grant arrived at Stamford Bridge. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Sir Anthony Grant : Madam Speaker, I entirely accept that. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 안토니 그란트 경 : 의장님, 저는 전적으로 그 것을 수용합니다. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 닫기 빡초아(kong****) Hansard
